name: Thai Aviation Academy
about: Thai Aviation Academy is a premier flight training institution dedicated to nurturing driven individuals into more than just pilots. Our curriculum is designed for superiority, emphasizing professionalism, care, and quality through skilled pilot instructors. Located in Roi Et, Thailand, our campus spans 10 Rai of land, conveniently close to the Roi Et airport, and features state-of-the-art facilities including an exhibition hall, auditorium, dormitory, fitness center, library, and more. We utilize modern aircraft such as the TECNAM P2006T, P2002JF, and P2010 for comprehensive training. Our environment fosters independent learning and productive use of free time, preparing students for a lifelong career in aviation. With advanced navigation facilities and favorable weather conditions, Thai Aviation Academy ensures a safe and comprehensive training experience, equipping students for a successful and global aviation career.
services:

Commercial Pilot License Course Aeroplane
